content:
• Expanded, state of the art fitness center 
  • Morning Equator coffee and Mighty Leaf tea 
  • Super-Fast Wi-Fi – unlimited device connections
  • PressReader* digital magazines and newspapers
  • Business Center with iMac Computers
  • Printing & Faxing
  • Tech Library Loans
  • Local & domestic long distance calls
  • Day use of New Albion bicycles & Blix e-bikes  
  • High-tech walking tour of Nob Hill by Vizzit*

A $25 nightly urban fee covers Stanford Court hotel’s extensive amenities. This fee is subject to San Francisco occupancy tax.

*Download app to enjoy. 

Additional amenities & Services 

  • Valet parking ($52+)
  • Vehicle charging station
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Multilingual staff
  • Concierge 
  • ATM on site 
  • Laundry/dry cleaning
  • Vinyl music library
